title: Immunity of panel members from liability
context: [ยง674-12] Immunity of panel members from liability. No member of the panel shall be liable in damages for libel, slander, or other defamation of character of any party to a panel proceeding for any action taken or any opinion, conclusion, finding, or recommendation made by a panel member while acting within the member&rsquo;s capacity as a member of the panel under this chapter. [L 1991, c 323, pt of ยง1]
